title: Hiver & Victor with The Casumo Company Limited (AI Addon)

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a solution for handling emails in multiple languages, particularly for tagging and understanding content in different alphabets.
signals.context: Finance department managing 30-50 emails daily in multiple languages including Macedonian and Spanish.

signals.problem_statement: The customer struggles with manually tagging emails related to invoices and payments, which could be automated to improve efficiency.
signals.suggested_solution: AI tagging for automatic categorization of emails as invoices or payment requests.
signals.context: Finance department managing 30-50 emails daily, looking for ways to streamline workflow.

signals.problem_statement: The customer has difficulty managing knowledge and processes scattered across different platforms, leading to inefficiencies.
signals.context: Documentation is not centralized, making it hard for team members to access necessary information quickly.
